oracle.pg.nosql

Class OraclePropertyGraphUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.common.OraclePropertyGraphUtilsBase
      • oracle.pg.nosql.OraclePropertyGraphUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MesgConsts

    public class OraclePropertyGraphUtils
extends OraclePropertyGraphUtilsBase
    This class contains utility functions to help manage property graphs stored in an Oracle NoSQL Database.

    • Method Detail

      • dropPropertyGraph

        public static void dropPropertyGraph(oracle.kv.KVStoreConfig kvStoreConfig,
                                     java.lang.String szGraphName)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.Exception
        Drops the specified property graph (including its associated tables). This operation cannot be undone.
        Parameters:
        kvStoreConfig - configuration for Oracle NoSQL Database
        szGraphName - name of the property graph.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • dropPropertyGraph

        public static void dropPropertyGraph(oracle.kv.KVStoreConfig kvStoreConfig,
                                     java.lang.String szGraphName,
                                     java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String password)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.Exception
        Drops the specified property graph (including its associated tables). This operation cannot be undone.
        Parameters:
        kvStoreConfig - configuration for Oracle NoSQL Database
        szGraphName - name of the property graph.
        username - name of the user
        password - password of the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • dropPropertyGraph

        public static void dropPropertyGraph(OraclePropertyGraph opg)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.Exception
        Drops the specified property graph (including its associated tables). This operation cannot be undone.
        Parameters:
        opg - an instance of OraclePropertyGraph
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • exportEdgeFlatFile

        public static void exportEdgeFlatFile(OraclePropertyGraph pg,
                                      java.io.OutputStream osEdge,
                                      int dop,
                                      boolean append,
                                      boolean closeStream)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function exports the edges of a given property graph into OPE flat file
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat file. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat file removing all existing data.
        closeStream - whether to close the OutputStream or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraph pg,
                                   java.io.OutputStream osVertex,
                                   java.io.OutputStream osEdge,
                                   boolean append,
                                   int dop)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osVertex - an OutputStream object for the vertex flat file
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat files. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraph pg,
                                   java.io.OutputStream osVertex,
                                   java.io.OutputStream osEdge,
                                   int dop,
                                   boolean append,
                                   boolean closeStreams)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osVertex - an OutputStream object for the vertex flat file
        osEdge - an OutputStream object for the edge flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat files. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        closeStreams - whether to close the OutputStreams or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static final void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraph pg,
                                         java.lang.String vertexFileName,
                                         java.lang.String edgeFileName,
                                         boolean append)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        vertexFileName - the name of the vertex flat file e.g. graph.opv
        edgeFileName - the name of the edge flat file e.g. graph.ope
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportFlatFiles

        public static final void exportFlatFiles(OraclePropertyGraph pg,
                                         java.lang.String vertexFileName,
                                         java.lang.String edgeFileName,
                                         int dop,
                                         boolean append)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function exports a given property graph into two flat files: one for vertices and the other for edges.
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        vertexFileName - the name of the vertex flat file e.g. graph.opv
        edgeFileName - the name of the edge flat file e.g. graph.ope
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat files. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat files removing all existing data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • exportVertexFlatFile

        public static void exportVertexFlatFile(OraclePropertyGraph pg,
                                        java.io.OutputStream osVertex,
                                        int dop,
                                        boolean append,
                                        boolean closeStream)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        This function exports the vertices of a given property graph into OPV flat file
        Parameters:
        pg - the property graph that will be exported into flat files
        osVertex - an OutputStream object for the vertex flat file
        dop - the degree of parallelism used when writing the data into the flat file. This will use multiple threads to optimize writing performance.
        append - if false, overwrite the existing flat file removing all existing data.
        closeStream - whether to close the OutputStream or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getGraphNames

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGraphNames(oracle.kv.KVStoreConfig kvsc)
                                                      throws OraclePropertyGraphException
        List all the names of the property graphs stored in the given database
        Parameters:
        kvsc - a KVStoreConfig object
        Returns:
        a list of Strings with the names of the property graphs in the database.
        Throws:
        OraclePropertyGraphException

      • quietlyCloseConnections

        public static void quietlyCloseConnections(oracle.kv.KVStoreConfig[] connections)
        Quietly closes an array KVStoreConfig objects storing all the configurations used to connect to an Oracle NoSQL Database
        Parameters:
        connections - an array of KVStoreConfig objects.

      • quietlyCloseKVStore

        public static void quietlyCloseKVStore(OraclePropertyGraph opg)
        Quietly close the KVStore object handling a connection to an Oracle NoSQL Database associated to the given property graph
        Parameters:
        opg - an OraclePropertyGraph object.
